definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: The programme had asked whether American beef was free from mad-cow disease.
sentences.chinese: 該節目曾經詢問美國牛肉是否免受瘋牛病影響。

sentences.english: Imports were cut because a case of mad-cow disease was found in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 美國發現瘋牛病例後，韓國削減了對美國牛肉的進口。

sentences.english: UK admits humans can catch CJD (Mad Cow Disease).
sentences.chinese: 英國政府承認人類能感染瘋牛病。

sentences.english: Many South Koreans fear that American beef is not safe from mad cow disease.
sentences.chinese: 許多韓國人擔心美國牛染有瘋牛病，食用不安全。

sentences.english: The BSE bug incubates for three years.
sentences.chinese: 瘋牛病病毒的潛伏期爲三年。

sentences.english: The fatal disease can be transmitted to humans eating meat from an infected animal.
sentences.chinese: 人吃了感染瘋牛病的牛肉有可能染上這種致命的疾病。
